G

GameController - Class in MVC
The GameController class handles the game logic and user interactions for the Battleship game.
GameController(GameModel, GameView) - Constructor for class MVC.GameController
Constructs a GameController object with the specified GameModel and GameView.
GameModel - Class in MVC
 
GameModel() - Constructor for class MVC.GameModel
Constructs a GameModel object with the default dimension and number of boards.
GameModel.CellState - Enum in MVC
Enum representing the possible states of a cell in the game grid.
GameView - Class in MVC
 
GameView(GameModel) - Constructor for class MVC.GameView
Constructs a GameView object with the specified GameModel.
getAboutItem() - Method in class MVC.GameView
Returns the "About" JMenuItem.
getBoatDirection() - Method in class MVC.GameView
Returns the selected boat direction from the boat direction choice box in the design panel.
getBoatSize() - Method in class MVC.GameView
Gets the selected boat size from the boat size choice box in the design panel.
getColorItem() - Method in class MVC.GameView
Returns the "Colors" JMenuItem.
getComputerHits() - Method in class MVC.GameModel
Returns the number of hits made by the computer opponent.
getDesignMode() - Method in class MVC.GameView
Gets the current design mode state.
getDimension() - Method in class MVC.GameModel
Returns the dimension of the game grid.
getExitItem() - Method in class MVC.GameView
Returns the "Exit" JMenuItem.
getGameMode() - Method in class MVC.GameView
Gets the current game mode state.
getGridButtons() - Method in class MVC.GameView
Returns the 3D array of JButtons representing the game grids.
getGridPlayer() - Method in class MVC.GameModel
Returns the player's grid.
getNewItem() - Method in class MVC.GameView
Returns the "New" JMenuItem.
getNumBoats() - Method in class MVC.GameModel
Returns the number of boats in the game.
getNumOfBoards() - Method in class MVC.GameModel
Returns the number of boards in the game.
getPlayerHits() - Method in class MVC.GameModel
Returns the number of hits made by the player.
getSolutionItem() - Method in class MVC.GameView
Returns the "Solution" JMenuItem.
getTotalTiles() - Method in class MVC.GameModel
Returns the total number of tiles occupied by the boats.
